inclusion.criterion: Relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma following 1 previous line of therapy and, is
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: scheduled by the investigator to be treated with vincristine, adriamycin and dexamethasone standard therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: measurable secretory multiple myeloma based on defined criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: fulfils defined laboratory requirements within 14 days before baseline
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: if female, the patient is either postmenopausal or surgically sterilised or willing to use an acceptable method of birth control for defined period of time
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: if male, the patient agrees to use an acceptable barrier method for contraception for a defined period of time.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: More than one previous line of therapy for multiple myeloma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of bortezomib in the previous line of therapy and/or received bortezomib in a previous trial
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known allergy or hypersensitivity to bortezomib, boron or mannitol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: peripheral neuropathy or neuropathic pain of grade 2 or higher
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has relapsed multiple myeloma and is scheduled to receive standard therapy. However, she has received previous lines of therapy and the use of bortezomib in her past treatment is unknown.
